name: Vietnam - South to North - 10 days (Free 01 local SIM Card with data + Free 2 Tickets of Water Puppet Show)
summary:
Discover Vietnam from Ho Chi Minh city to Hanoi in 10 - day tour package. 
Route: Ho Chi Minh City - Hoi An - Hanoi- Halong Bay - Hanoi
You’ll discover the hustle and bustlecrazy Ho Chi Minh city (formly named Saigon), experience the water life in Melong Delta, discover the underground network tunnels during the war, biking along the acient town  to explore the city of lantern Hoi An, soak up fascinating local culture, learn to cook delicious Vietnamese food, relax on beautiful beaches, party the night away, immerse the beauty of capital Hanoi, experience the stunning Ha Long Bay, go kayaking,and much more.

timeline.title: Ho Chi Minh Arrival
timeline.description:
We'll pick you up from the airport and take you to the Hotel in District 1, Ho Chi Minh city. You'll then have plenty of time to recover from your flight, chill out.

Overnight in Hotel in Ho Chi Minh (Meal: No)

timeline.title: Mekong Delta
timeline.description:
Today, do the day trip to Mekong Delta.  You will be picked up at your hotel in the morning. We’ll explore the incredibly lush green beauty of the Mekong Delta by boat, learn first-hand how the locals live, visit local villages and experience daily life on the Mekong. 
Then We return Ho Chi Minh city. Stay overnight at hotel. 
Meals (B- L)

timeline.title: Cu Chi Tunnels
timeline.description:
Today we’ll explore Cu Chi Tunnels. A fascinating network of underground tunnels used as supply routes, hideouts and living quarters by guerrilla fighters during the Vietnam War. We’ll arrive back to Ho Chi Minh City in the afternoon.

Overnight at hotel. Meals ( B- L)

timeline.title: Fly to Hoi An
timeline.description:
Check out at hotel then take a 1-hour flight to Danang. Here, you 'll be picked up and transferred to Hoi An by private car. Check in hotel. Rest of the day is leisure and free time. 

Overnight at hotel in Hoian center. Meal (B)

timeline.title: My Son Sanctuary
timeline.description:
After breakfast at hotel, We' ll start the day tour to My Son - the ancient citadel of Champa's Kindom in the 4th century. My Son is recognized World Cultural Heritage.

Today,  We'll have 2 hours to discover the site by walking throughout the landscape, learning histories of the huge religious complex with over 70 towers and temples of different architectures as welll as enjoy the traditional performances of Champa People.
Then, We 'll visit local house to learn how to make rice-paper, you will enjoy your own hand-making product later on.
Before getting back hotel, we take a boat trip to Hoi An with nice and cool breeze on boarding, beautiful river scenery 

Overnight at hotel (Meals: B-L)

timeline.title: Hoi An - Night train to Hanoi
timeline.description:
Free day for you. Cycling to beaches or cycling along the ancient town. Try cofee and local food or do clothes tailored in Hoi An. 
In the evening, be transferred to Danang Railway Station to catch the night train to Hanoi (16 hours journey, you will see the best scenery along way)

Overnight on train - you 'll stay in 4-berth soft cabin. Meal (B)

timeline.title: Arrive Hanoi
timeline.description:
Arrive Hanoi in the mid day then check in hotel. Rest of your time is relaxing and free exploring the Old town of .  
Get Free tickets for evening Water puppet show at Thang Long Water Puppet Theatre 
Overnight at hotel in Hanoi. Meal (No)

timeline.title: Halong Bay
timeline.description:
This day is the most amazing day. We’ll depart for  2 Day / 1 Night Boat trip to the stunning World Natural Wonder of Ha Long Bay. We’ll cruise on beautiful emerald green waters on our traditional Vietnamese ‘junk’ boat through towering limestone islands topped with rainforest. We’ll do Cave exoloring, Kayaking, Cooking class on boat then spend the night on the boat.

Meals (B- L- D)

timeline.title: Halong Bay - Back Hanoi
timeline.description:
See more of Halong Bay, do more activites in 2nd day. Cruising back to Habour to go back Hanoi.
Return Hanoi around 16.00 pm

Stay overnight at hotel in Hanoi. Meals (B- L)

timeline.title: Hanoi Departure
timeline.description:
Your adventure comes to an end. You can either check out and flight back home, stay on longer in Vietnam or continue your travels. 

Goodbye

name: Classis Sai Gon 6 Days 5 Nights
summary: Asia Focus Travel provide 6 days 5 nights start and end in Ho Chi Minh City! With the adventure tour Sai Gon Highlights 6 days 5 nights, you have a 6 day tour package taking you through Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam and 3 other destinations in Vietnam. Sai Gon Highlights 6 days 5 nights includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.

timeline.title: Ho Chi Minh Arrival (No Meal)
timeline.description:
Welcome to Saigon! You will be met at the airport and transferred to hotel in Sai Gon. After checking
into the hotel, the rest of the day is yours to enjoy. Sai Gon is a bustling, dynamic and industrious
centre, the largest city in the country, the economic capital and the cultural trendsetter. Yet within the
teeming metropolis are the timeless traditions and beauty of an ancient culture
Overnight in Sai Gon

timeline.title: Ho Chi Minh City tour and Cu Chi Tunnel (B,L)
timeline.description:
Breakfast at your hotel
Pick up: 7:30 to 8:15
Come back: 18:30
the morning trip to visit Independence Palace, also known at the Reunification palace, was built on
the sight of the former Norodom palace. The Independence palace is a widely known landmark of
Ho Chi Minh City and was designed by the architect Ngo Viet Thu. Continue seeing the beautiful
structures from the French Colonial times such as the Notre Dame Cathedral, the historic Central
Post Office. Followed by the remarkable site of the War Remnants Museum the museum has a vast
display of the both the Indochina wars.
Have lunch at local restaurant.
Depart for Cu Chi tunnel, the trip will take approximately one and a half hours bus driving. Upon
arrival, before exploring the tunnels, you will have some short introduction followed by introductory
video about how the tunnels were constructed and how the people survived in the harsh conditions
of the war time. Then, spend your time to explore the remaining area and tunnel systems which
included the special constructed living areas with kitchens, bedrooms side by side with other martial
facilities like storage, weapons factories, field hospitals, and command centers helping whoever lives
inside the tunnels meet their basic needs. Besides, there are also many hidden trap doors and
dangerous traps within the maze-like tunnels for security purpose during the war. Afterward, special
tea and cassava (guerilla’s food during the war) will be served.
Break time for relax or time for those who want to try the real shooting gun.
Return to Saigon
Overnight in Sai Gon

timeline.title: Ho Chi Minh City – My Tho – Ben Tre – Can Tho (meals incl:B,L/D)
timeline.description:
8.00am: Pick up at your hotel in HCMC ( To be advised ). Depart for My Tho .Take a boat ride along the river , view the stilt houses and the fruit plantation along the river bank. Proceed to Tortoise island for lunch . Then a boat ride to An Khanh – a less touristy attraction in Ben Tre and enjoy cruising on a hand-rowed sampan under the shade of water coconut trees along natural canals. Then enjoy seasonal fruit & honey tea to the sound of "Southern Vietnamese folk music", performed by the locals. Visit a family business which epitomizes the idyllic rural lifestyle, taste delicious coconut candy & observe the pastoral life as you roam through the fruit plantations and villages. Proceed to Can Tho and check in on arrival.  
Option: stay at home stay in Can Tho Transfer by motor boat to a small village in Cai Rang district. Check into your riverside cottage. In the afternoon, go cycling or trekking around the village to experience the rural lifestyle of the Mekong Delta people. Join a family as they prepare dinner, then share the meal with them. Enjoy an evening of traditional folk music with your neighbors. Overnight in your riverside cottage

timeline.title: Can Tho – Cai Rang Floating market – Chau Doc – Tra Su Sanctuary (meals incl: B/L)
timeline.description:
After breakfast, take a boat trip to explore the picturesque tributaries of the Lower Mekong River (Bassac River), then visit the Cai Rang floating market, which are the best in the region. You will probably have tried Vietnamese vermicelli soup, so now go and see how it is made. Then wander around the village and talk with the local people. Learn how to cross a “monkey bridge” which is built from a single bamboo.
Lunch at the local restaurant . 
Proceed to Chau Doc .Take the boat trip through the floating village and visit the fish farm to see how the Mekong Delta people raise fish from their floating houses. Visit the Cham minority in their traditional weaving village . Summit of the Sam Mountain, admire the beautiful landscape around the Vietnamese-Cambodian border. Visit the carved pagoda. Continue the tour to visit Tra Su , getting to the wild birds Sanctuary , cruising smoothly with small boats to discover the arrays of splendid canals deep into the forest.

timeline.title: Chau Doc - Sai Gon (Meal included: B,L)
timeline.description:
Following breakfast in the early morning, go for a short walk before pick-up at the river bank. Journey to the fish farms and floating village of the Cham community, before taking the bus to back Ho Chi Minh City. 
Overnight in Sai Gon

timeline.title: Sai Gon Departure (Meal included: B)
timeline.description:
Breakfast at hotel then fee and easy until the driver pick you up at your hotel transfer to Tan Son
Nhat airport for departure flight. End of trip!

name: 7 Days in Southern Vietnam
summary: Exploring the dynamic heart of Vietnam - Ho Chi Minh City as known as Saigon. Enjoying the boat trip on Mekong River to see the colorful floating markets and discover the lifestyle of Mekong people

timeline.title: WELCOME TO HO CHI MINH CITY
timeline.description: Upon arriving at Tan Son Nhat airport, you will be transferred to your hotel downtown. As the largest of Vietnam's cities, the hustle and bustle of life co-exists with 300 years of timeless traditions and the beauty of a mixed colonial-orient culture. The remainder of the day is free for you to relax. Overnight in Hochiminh city

timeline.title: HO CHI MINH CITY FREE DAY (B)
timeline.description:
There is a free time to relax or explore Hochiminh city on your own way.
Overnight in Hochiminh city

timeline.title: HO CHI MINH - CU CHI TUNNEL – CITY TOUR (B)
timeline.description:
After breakfast, depart for Cu Chi tunnels.
Arriving at Cu Chi tunnels (Ben Dinh) and proceeding to an underground hut to watch a short video and presentation about Cu Chi tunnels before having a real hand-on experience of what it took to live in the tunnels. Afterward, test tasting the steamed tapioca root which is the main staple food in Cu Chi during the war. For those interested, there is an opportunity to fire off an AK47 or MK16 with real ammunitions at the nearby shooting range. Leaving Cu Chi tunnels at noon and returning back to HCM city for lunch at own expense.
Afternoon, visiting War Remnants Museum - originally opened in September 1975; it displays old military equipment and other related items from Vietnam War. Afterward, continuing seeing the Reunification Palace, formerly known as the Presidential Palace. The place symbolizes the end of Vietnam War when a North Vietnamese army tank went through its gates. Then taking a short stroll to see Notre Dame Cathedral and General Post Office, they are the beautiful examples of architecture from the French colonial period.
Back to hotel for leisure and overnight.

timeline.title: HO CHI MINH FREE DAY (B)
timeline.description:
There is a free time to relax or explore Hochiminh city on your own way.
Overnight in Hochiminh

timeline.title: HO CHI MINH –CAI BE – VINH LONG – HO CHI MINH (B, L)
timeline.description: Today you'll have a full day excursion to Mekong Delta. You will depart for Cai Be (3h) around 8am. Enjoy the green paddy fields stretching towards the horizon. When you arrive in Cai Be, you’ll board a motorized boat that takes you to the floating market, a sight that you’ll see no where else in the world. Next, your row boat will zigzag through a maze of shadow canals to arrive at a great orchard where you can freely taste many of the amous tropical fruits of Vietnam and watch locals’ as they complete their daily chores. Then we’ll see how coconut candy, crispy rice cake and ceramics are made here (served free with premium hot tea.) After this, you will roam through a village by bike to check out several rural shops or you can relax in a hammock for a short rest. Then you will head back to Hochiminh for a good night’s sleep

timeline.title: HO CHI MINH FREE DAY (B)
timeline.description:
There is a free time to relax or explore Hochiminh city on your own way.
Overnight in Hochiminh

timeline.title: HO CHI MINH DEPARTURE
timeline.description: There is a free time to relax or further explore Hochiminh. The tour ends after your transfer to Tan San Nhat Airport for departure.

name: Northern Vietnam Hanoi - Ninh Binh - Halong short group tour 5 days
summary: Start and end in Hanoi! With the sightseeing for the Highlight of  Northern Vietnam - 5 Days, you have a 5 day tour package taking you through Hanoi, Ninh Binh and Ha Long Bay for a 5 Days includes accommodation as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.

timeline.title: Arrival Hanoi -Private Car
timeline.description:
Your trip begins with arrival in Vietnam. Your private driver will meet and greet you at the airport. You will be escorted to the hotel by the private transportation. Check-in to the hotel and get over the jet lag.   You can mooch through the streets of the city. Historic charm, architectural marvels, and products’ variety are splashed all over this area.  After enjoying the first day yourself and return to the hotel for a relaxing sleep.
Meal: None

timeline.title: Hoa Lu Ancient citadel - Tam Coc Nature Boat Trip full day (B/L)
timeline.description:
7:45-8:30 AM: Picked up by our tour guide at your hotel at The Old Quarter, then depart for Ninh Binh city towards to the South of Hanoi. Have a short-break en route.
10:30 AM: Arrive in Hoa Lu, visit Hoa Lu - The Acient Capital and the remaining two temples dedicated to King Dinh & King Le.
11:30 AM: Go back to the bus, and then from here drive to Tam Coc grottoes (16km from Hoa Lu). 
12:00 AM: Arrive Tam Coc wharf.
12:15 AM: Have a lavish buffet lunch at a local restaurant.
01:30 PM: Take an exciting sampan boat ride in Tam Coc grottoes (Halong on land).
03:30 PM: Proceed a cycling along country lane to enjoy the beautiful scenery of lush paddy fields and discover real countryside of Vietnam.
04:30 PM: Get on the shuttle bus to come back Hanoi.
07:00 PM: Arrive in Hanoi, go back to our hotel in The Old Quarter. Day Trip ends.

timeline.title: Hanoi - Halong Bay Shared Cruise And Bus (B/L/D)
timeline.description:
•	07h45: Pick up from your hotel in Hanoi. Drive to Ha Long City through the green fields in the Red River Delta.
•	10h00: Stopover on the way for a refreshment break.
•	12h00: Embark at Ha Long wharf – Break and photography time
•	12h30: Boat Cruises on Halong, enjoy a welcoming drink and cruise briefing.
•	13h30: Have lunch while cruising in Bai Tu Long Bay, admiring the fascinating rock formations in the bay.
•	15h30: Transfer by tender to Thien Canh Son cave. Our tour guide will take you to a huge cave with many interesting stalactite and stalagmite in different amazing shapes …. After about half an hour visiting, you will go back to tender and return to the boat. Then return to cruise for your leisure or join sunbathing, enjoy swimming in the crystal clear water. Join with cooking class by our chef.
•	19h00: Vietnamese style set dinner is served on board.
•	21h00: Take some leisure time to enjoy chatting at the bar or enjoy some night fishing. Stay overnight on boat.
•	Meal: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner

timeline.title: Halong Bay - Hanoi (B/L)
timeline.description:
•	07h30: Have breakfast and enjoy sunrise on the bay.
•	09h00: Visit ancient Vung Vieng floating village you are not only be immersed in the quiet and peaceful atmosphere, but also be surrounded by the rocky mountains by small bamboo boat for an hour in to the ancient village then return to cruise for relaxing and check out the room.
•	10h30: Have lunch while cruising back through Ha Long Bay to the pier
•	11h30: Disembark at Ha long wharf, time to say goodbye to the crew.
•	12h00: Return from Ha Long to Hanoi.
•	14h00: Stopover on the way for a refreshment break.
•	16h00: Arrive in Hanoi. End of the trip.Activities
•	Swimming
•	Kayaking
•	Cooking demonstration
•	Squid fishing
•	Excursions to caves, grottos, beaches & fishing village
What to bring 
•	Sun block, Camera + Film, Insect repellent, Original Passport, hat, Swimming clothes and Sun glasses

Meal: Breakfast, Lunch.

timeline.title: Hanoi Departure (B)
timeline.description: Relish a healthy breakfast on the final day of your trip. Complete the hotel check-out formalities after which you can visit the local markets and buy souvenirs for your loved ones.  Later, proceed for departure and board your flight back home. Trip Ends.

name: Vietnam Compact Tour 6 Days 5 Nights (From Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi)
summary: Vietnam compact tour 6 days 5 nights is highlight of Vietnam included Ho Chi Minh city and Hanoi.

timeline.title: Ho Chi Minh Arrival (No Meal)
timeline.description:
Welcome to Saigon! You will be met at the airport and transferred to hotel in Sai Gon. After checking into the hotel, the rest of the day is yours to enjoy. Sai Gon is a bustling, dynamic and industrious centre, the largest city in the country, the economic capital and the cultural trendsetter. Yet within the teeming metropolis are the timeless traditions and beauty of an ancient culture. 
Overnight in Saigon.

timeline.title: Sai Gon - Cai Be Floating market (B,L)
timeline.description:
Breakfast take away.
Pick up: 6:30 to 6:45
Come back: 17:30 to 18:00
Pick up at your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City. Depart for Cai Be by car/van via Trung Luong Express
Highway. On arrival in Cai Be, set off by motor boat to visit the Cai Be floating market and watch the
locals trading fruit and many other commodities on board their vessels. Visit a small family business
to see how coconut candy and crispy rice popcorn are made. Then wander into the small villages
and visit the orchard and fruit plantation, accompanied by traditional southern Vietnamese folk
music.
Keep cruising to experience the charms of the Upper Mekong Delta, where you can immerse
yourself in nature. Enjoy your cooking experience and learn how to prepare special Vietnamese
dishes. Food cooked by yourself and fresh river food served in the heart of the garden. Relax in the
hammocks to get back your energy.
Cycle around the village path with fruit orchards and bonsai garden. Meet the local islanders to learn
more about the local daily life in the Mekong delta. Take a boat ride back to Cai Be and meet your
bus for the trip back to Ho Chi Minh City.
Overnight in Sai Gon

timeline.title: Sai Gon - Cu Chi tunnel - Flight to Hanoi (B,L)
timeline.description:
Breakfast at your hotel. 
Pick up at your hotel and depart to Cu Chi will take approximately one and a half hours bus driving. 
Upon arrival, before exploring the tunnels, you will have some short introduction followed by introductory video about how the tunnels were constructed and how the people survived in the harsh conditions of the war time. Then, spend your time to explore the remaining area and tunnel systems which included the special constructed living areas with kitchens, bedrooms side by side with other martial facilities like storage, weapons factories, field hospitals, and command centers helping whoever lives inside the tunnels meet their basic needs. Besides, there are also many hidden trap doors and dangerous traps within the maze-like tunnels for security purpose during the war. Afterward, special tea and cassava (guerilla’s food during the war) will be served. 
Break time for relax or time for those who want to try the real shooting gun. 
Return to Saigon at 12:30 
Free time until to my driver will pick you up at your hotel transfer to Tan San Nhat airport take flight to Hanoi 
Welcome to Hanoi! You will be met at the airport and transferred to hotel in Hanoi. Renowned as the “Paris of the East”, Hanoi is one of Asia’s most delightful cities. Rich in culture and history this diverse city draws its influences from both French and Chinese culture. The rest of day is yours to enjoy. 
Overnight at hotel in Ha Noi

timeline.title: Hanoi - Ha Long – Sung Sot cave- Titop island (B/L/D)
timeline.description:
8.00 – 8.30: The tour guide will pick you up at the hotel.
11.30: Arrive harbor, transfer by tender to Cruise, and enjoy welcome drinks, receive cruise briefing, safety instructions then check in to your cabin
12.30: Lunch in Vietnamese cuisine of fresh seafood and an assortment of appetizing favorites are served while sailing through these islands
14.30: Start visit Surprising cave is one of the most biggest and amazing cave in the bay
16.00: Continue to Titop island where you can enjoy swimming on sandy beach and climbing up the Top for hall panorama view Ha Long Bay
18.00: Come back to cruise later to enjoy sun set party on sundeck
19.00: Dinner is served in the restaurant. Enjoy delicious local food prepared and served for you by our wonderful onboard catering staff.
20.00: Join the fishing excursion or singing karaoke, have a drink or dancing at the bar.
Overnight on cruise

timeline.title: Day 5: Ha Long Bay - Hanoi (Breakfast, Lunch)
timeline.description:
06.00: Waking up enjoying beautiful moments when a blazing sunrise breaks the clouds of the island on the bay (accept winter time have no sunrise)
07.00: Your breakfast will be ready in quite bay.
08.00: Our cruising to Pearl Farm where you can see real pearl raise in Ha Long bay
08.30: Start doing kayaking paddle explore by your own way around the bay
10.00: Check out your cabin, ready for housekeeping clean cabin to welcome new group
10.30: You will have short cooking class fresh Vietnamese spring roll.
11.00: Lunch is serve onboard
12.00: Get on harbor take the bus back to Hanoi, say goodbye Halong Bay
17.00: Arrive Hanoi, drop you off at the hotel, Check in hotel
Overnight in Hanoi

timeline.title: Hanoi City tour Half Day - Departure (B,L)
timeline.description:
07:40 - 8:30 Meet your tour guide .
OPTION 1: TUESDAY, THURSDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY) and Monday, Wed and Frid we will give you another option to suitable with your flight 
Start the trip with Tran Quoc pagoda, a Buddhist relic and national heritage lying on the West Lake.             
Visit Ho Chi Minh’s complex, the final resting place of Viet Nam’s greatest father; his house-on-stil and One pillar pagoda – modeled after a lotus flower, a symbol of Hanoi.
Arrive Ethnology museum to learn about cultures of 54 ethnic groups living in Vietnam.
13:00 Have a rest and enjoy lunch in a local restaurant in Hanoi Old Quarter.
